com.multi.redis.config

类 RedisConfig

  • java.lang.Object

  • 所有已实现的接口:

public class RedisConfig
extends org.springframework.cache.annotation.CachingConfigurerSupport

      • keyGenerator

        @Bean
public org.springframework.cache.interceptor.KeyGenerator keyGenerator()
        为缓存生成key的策略
        指定者:
        keyGenerator 在接口中 org.springframework.cache.annotation.CachingConfigurer
        覆盖:
        keyGenerator 在类中 org.springframework.cache.annotation.CachingConfigurerSupport
        返回:
        KeyGenerator 生成策略

      • CacheManager

        @Bean
public org.springframework.cache.CacheManager CacheManager(org.springframework.data.redis.core.RedisTemplate redisTemplate)
        管理缓存
        参数:
        redisTemplate - redis驱动模版
        返回:

        @Bean
public org.springframework.data.redis.connection.jedis.JedisConnectionFactory redisConnectionFactory()
